references.reason: This paper is one of the fundamental papers on vision transformers which is the basis for how LMMs understand visual information
Diffusion is a recent technology for how to generate realistic images so it needs to be detected as a method for generating fake images.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This is another important diffusion paper that is responsible for how to create high resolution images.
Visual instruction tuning is a popular approach to LMM training so it is a key reference for building FakeVLM.
GPT-4o is one of the best closed-source LMMs so it must be compared to in synthetic detection of images.
